mapper.insert: insert into person_order(order_time, order_amount, order_money,order_status, apprise_status,pro_id, user_id) values (#{order_time},#{order_amount}, #{order_money},#{order_status},#{apprise_status},#{pro_id},#{user_id})
mapper.select: select o.order_id,p.pro_name,p.pro_discount,p.pro_iPrice,o.order_amount, o.order_money,o.order_status,o.order_time from person_order o join person_pro p on o.pro_id = p.pro_id join person_img i on p.pro_id = i.pro_id where o.user_id=#{uid} order by o.order_id

select o.order_id,p.pro_name,p.pro_discount,p.pro_iPrice,o.order_amount, o.order_money,o.order_status,o.order_time from person_order o join person_pro p on o.pro_id = p.pro_id join person_img i on p.pro_id = i.pro_id where o.order_status=#{order_status} and o.user_id=#{uid} order by o.order_id

select o.order_id,p.pro_name,p.pro_discount,p.pro_iPrice,o.order_amount, o.order_money,o.order_status,o.order_time from person_order o join person_pro p on o.pro_id = p.pro_id join person_img i on p.pro_id = i.pro_id where o.order_status=#{order_status} and o.apprise_status=#{apprise_status} and o.user_id=#{uid} order by o.order_id
mapper.delete: delete from person_order where apprise_status=0 and pid=#{pid} and uid=#{uid}
